marklogic.body:
I think I'm on record (maybe in my blank unreg days) as hating Pete Campbell with the Heat of a thousand suns - largely because of how he treated women, first Peggy and then the neighbor's foreign nanny and so forth.
I think he's gotten better on that front too, perhaps because his wife and he make such a great team and she keeps him grounded; he'd better shut his ears to the guys on the train, let them ruin their marriages, that Trudy's a keeper. And besides, without her around, he's liable to go Off molesting nannys again.
